  • {{educacion.titulo}}

    {{educacion.descripcion}}

    • import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PorfolioService } from 'src/app/servicios/porfolio.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-education', templateUrl: './education.component.html', styleUrls: ['./education.component.css'] }) export class EducationComponent { educationList:any; constructor(private datosPorfolio:PorfolioService){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.datosPorfolio.ObtenerDatos().subscribe(data=>{ console.log(data); this.educationList=data.educacion; }) } }
